mapper.select: SELECT a.id id, a.username username, a.sex sex, a.age age, a.phone phone, a.qq qq, a.wechat wechat, a.aera aera, a.education education, a.introducer introducer, b.role_name roleName FROM sys_user a left outer join sys_role b on a.role_id=b.id WHERE a.delete_status='1' and a.id=#{id} order by a.id desc
